content: I just noticed that milestone 3 for Lean 4 has been released (4 weeks ago) and am struggling to locate the release notes for the the massive work that has been done since the previous milestone. Is there any?
If you wanna keep up with the rather rapid changes: https://github.com/leanprover/lean4-nightly/releases, I'm not aware of any release notes specifically for v4 m3 though
